rows.label: qst002801_msg0001
rows.name: I am well aware of who you are.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0002
rows.name:
I heard you defeated Aeshma
alongside Meleph-sama...

rows.label: qst002801_msg0003
rows.name:
I have a request for someone
as skilled as you. Would
you be interested?

rows.label: qst002801_msg0004
rows.name:
I am a member of the
Technological Research Center.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0005
rows.name:
Next to me are the remains of a
weapon used in a great war long ago.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0006
rows.name:
I intend to research its
functions and performance...

rows.label: qst002801_msg0007
rows.name:
and use that knowledge to
help develop new weapons
for the Superbian army.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0008
rows.name:
Weapons of the same type are
scattered throughout Temperantia.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0009
rows.name: I would like you to retrieve them.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0010
rows.name:
I believe there are many remains
here, but retrieving about four
should be sufficient.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0011
rows.name: Well then, I leave it in your hands.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0101
rows.name:
Next to me are the remains of a
weapon used in a great war long ago.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0102
rows.name: Please retrieve four of these.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0103
rows.name:
They are scattered throughout
Temperantia, so please search
various locations.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0201
rows.name:
It seems you've safely
gathered them. As expected.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0202
rows.name:
I thank you. Now I can
further my research.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0203
rows.name:
Still, I apologize for asking
such busy people as yourselves.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0204
rows.name:
The troops stationed here in
Temperantia are the first army
of the Second Imperial Guard.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0205
rows.name:
They are fully occupied with
guarding Aeshma, so my request
for cooperation was denied.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0206
rows.name:
Therefore, I have quite a
bit of budget left over. I
will be generous with you.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0207
rows.name:
Are you saying the taxes of the
Superbian people are being wasted?

rows.label: qst002801_msg0208
rows.name:
N-no! That was not my
intention at all...

rows.label: qst002801_msg0209
rows.name:
However, your reprimand is
just, Special Inquisitor
Meleph. My thinking was naive.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0210
rows.name:
Just because there is a budget
surplus, I should avoid being
extravagant or wasteful.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0211
rows.name:
Therefore, the reward to
be paid to the Special
Inquisitor shall be 0G.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0212
rows.name: I ask for your understanding...

rows.label: qst002801_msg0213
rows.name: V-very well...
